00020 /*
00021 *********************************************************************************************************
00022 *                                        delay
00023 *
00024 * Description: This function is a simple delay execution function.
00025 *
00026 * Arguments  : delayCount - number of seconds to delay execution
00027 *
00028 * Returns    : none
00029 *
00030 * Note(s)    : 
00031 *********************************************************************************************************
00032 */
00033 __attribute__ ((naked)) void delay(unsigned int delayCount) 
00034 {
00035     /* First arg comes in register R15
00036      * the loop uses 3 cycles per round
00037      * the eight cycles come from the call overhead and ret
00038      */
00039     asm("_wait_: dec %0\n  jnz _wait_\n ret" :: "r" (delayCount));
00040 }
